books.title: Harry Potter and The Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter's life is miserable. His parents are dead and he's stuck with his heartless relatives. But everything changes when a mysterious letter arrives, inviting him to a school of magic...

books.title: Harry Potter and The Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J.K. Rowling

books.title: Percy Jackson and The Lightning Thief
books.author: Rick Riordan

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society, Dune tells the story of Paul Atreides and the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the most valuable substance in the universe.
